purpose: This document is to help someone brand new to the repository answer the questions 'how do i get started?'  think efficent to-the-point how to guide that answers this question, and not a learning tutorial journey that would include a bit more explanation of concepts. the audience for this is the person who just wants to get their hands dirty fast so needs to get the basic usage of doc-evergreen understand fast.  then they will likely go explore other stuff on their own -- they don't need a tutorial.
